overview:
Julian Claxton is an independent security advisor, currently based in Sydney, Australia.

He can be contacted in the strictest of confidence to undertake a range of security tasks ranging from strategic security consulting, to security management and counter-espionage. He is professional, discrete and experienced in dealing with highly-sensitive matters for major corporations, executives and [ultra] high-net-worth individuals and family offices.

Julian is more than happy to [and regularly does] share his knowledge and experience as a conference speaker or in more discrete forums, upon request.

He is a frequent traveller and well connected to like-minded professionals, across the globe.
